name: Keep Me Alive - Ludum Dare 46
description:
Keep Me Alive is my entry for Ludum Dare 46.

Theme: Keep it alive

You are falling from the sky and have to find a way to survive the fall. What do you do? Land on a stack of hay, a swimming pool, or a trampoline to soften your fall!  The game gets more challenging the more levels you complete.

Controls: WASD and arrow keys

Made with Unity Game Engine. Source code: https://github.com/Tetracyl/KeepMeAlive
